data.title: Wiseguy vs wise guy
data.meta_description:
Hi there. My friend and I can't agree on this one: 
I think it is okay to use 'wiseguy' in a story where the main character writes his memoires in slang...
data.text:
Hi there. My friend and I can't agree on this one:

I think it is okay to use 'wiseguy' in a story where the main character writes his memoires in slang style. My friend thinks it should be written as 'wise guy'. Does anyone have an idea? Thanks X

Neither. See our dictionary for the meaning of wiseguy. Unless your character is writing in an informal style (not slang) and is describing somebody else as a 'wiseguy'.
